```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    first_obj = df.head()
    second_obj = df.describe()
    return [first_obj, second_obj]

preview_data(data)
```
